title: Petition to have Mastery 7 Tahm be 'Unbenched' instead of Warden
body: Or at least have the message say "Congratulations, you have successfully Unbenched the Kench" instead of the regular thing.

replies.body: If there can be a shyv+ez leg day bundle, there can be an unbenched kench
Skin called 'Unbenched Kench' with him in his basketball shorts that don't fit and a torn up Bilgewater jersey, taken off the bench when Darius gets injured.
As funny as that would be, I really want his next skin to be a more serious skin, or at least more cool than funny or quirky.
I'd kill for a gentleman TK
I felt like his default skin/VO is already kinda gentleman-ish, or at the very least similar enough that I wouldn't pay legendary skin price for it.
http://orig12.deviantart.net/4fbc/f/2016/067/b/c/gentleman_tahm_kench___skin_concept_by_fivetinsoldiers-d9udmax.png
I'd love primal/horrific TK, him as he was when the world was young: a hunger, without end.
So basically a teenage boy.
I'd kill for Mafia Boss/Gangster Leader TK. He fits it so well, with his foul, silver tongue, his fat body, and IMAGINE A MOTOR WITH SIDESPAN WITH HIS ULTI! xD
I'll stay away from your house for a while, I guess?

> [{quoted}](name=THE RlVER KlNG,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=iAPsUzVJ,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-08-29T02:22:37.819+0000)
>
> Skin called 'Unbenched Kench' with him in his basketball shorts that don't fit and a torn up Bilgewater jersey, taken off the bench when Darius gets injured.

So we basically make him Wayne Knight's character from Space Jam?  

...  Sure, why not.
That made me think of Space Jam when they call in Newman when all the toons are injured.
But what happens when they release mastery 8?
A bunch of bitching and moaning from people who can't get S+?
We already have that with S-. I can't wait until the hate begins.
I feel you, but it should be for mastery 8 for getting those S+'s baby. Only the best kenches should be unbenched.
So mastery 8 has been confirmed?
Not officially, but it is safe to assume the way 6 and 7 are.
At this point I'm starting to think each champion should have their own unique Mastery 7 title

Perhaps they will at rank 8!

I hope rank 8 does more than that though.

I feel like every champion could use a unique name for their Level 7 Mastery.

lmao "Tilt MAchine"
Pls Rito custom mastery per champ
Yes, please. {{champion:223}}
HELL YEAH
No! I want that to be saved for level 10 mastery! :)
yes but what happens when they release mastery level 8????? do you want to lose your cool new title????
Why do you even play Tahm Kench? He's cancer to play against now. He used to be one of my favorite champions, but they just ruined him.

LOL. Still though, don't you prefer release Tahm Kench over the current one? He was in a better spot, if you ask me.
I hated the E nerf and I want my movement speed back when I eat an ally.
{{champion:12}} Level 7 Milked cow?

Hey i am a wukong main and I want to jump on the bandwagon.
Wukong lvl 7 has to be WuKING or harambae
Yes please.
Yeah, that would be awesome
A unique title for every champion at the final mastery rank perhaps 8 wouldn't be too difficult now would it?
Consider this petition signed
Yes! Pls rito
no
These should honestly start going in "Memes & Games"
Why don't you guys just ask for custom titles bought with RP or Blue Essence or whatever already?
